wikipedia_page.main: George Waller VC (June 1827 – 10 January 1877) was an English recipient of the Victoria Cross, the highest and most prestigious award for gallantry in the face of the enemy that can be awarded to British and Commonwealth forces.

*George Waller, recipient of the Victoria Cross
George Waller (1827-1877) was an English recipient of the Victoria Cross.
George Waller may also refer to:
*George Waller Jr., author of books such as The Secret of Skull Mountain
